content.prompt: Which of the following is classified as an antagonist?

choices.label: Cocaine, because it floods the brain with dopamine.
Marijuana, because they lead to increased central nervous system activity.
An antidepressant, because they block serotonin and norepinephrine receptors.
Lithium, because it blocks the reuptake of serotonin.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
